DOC.brief_summary: Dry eye is a common syndrome associated with symptoms of dryness, burning, itching and grittiness of eyes. The objective of this study is to investigate the effects of a moisturizing product in liquid formula on symptoms and signs of dry eye and on skin around the eyes.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of a Moisturizing Product on Dry Eye and Skin
DOC.criteria: Dry eye symptoms OSDI score 20 or higher Dryness, burning or foreign body sensation moderate or higher Severe eye diseases Known allergy to any of the ingredients of the product Laser surgery of eyes during the last year
